snippet: Sevilla will play Barcelona in the Copa del Rey final on May 21 after drawing, 2-2, with Celta Vigo, advancing by 6-2 on aggregate.
abstract: Sevilla draws with Celta Vigo, 2-2, and advances to play Barcelona in Copa del Ray final; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Sevilla will play Barcelona in the Copa del Rey final on May 21 after drawing, 2-2, with Celta Vigo, advancing by 6-2 on aggregate.

headline.main: A Sevilla-Barcelona Final in Copa del Rey
